title: Found a bug to use any skin..
body:
In the new champion select, if you select a skin and trade with someone, they will use that skin even if they don't own it. This glitch has worked 3/3 times I have tried it. Probably should get if fixed soon, no one will buy skins.
- CrimeStoppersUSA

replies.body:
Hiya CrimeStoppersUSA,

Thanks for the report! This issue has been resolved.
